game.name: Max's Adventures: Valentine's Edition
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션
game.shortDescription: Help Max meddle in his aunt’s love life in Valentine Town! Awkward dates, chaotic choices, and unexpected romance spiral out of control in this story-driven comedy adventure full of humor, chaos, and meta mischief. WISHLIST NOW!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Help Max meddle in his aunt’s love life in Valentine Town! Awkward dates, chaotic choices, and unexpected romance spiral out of control in this story-driven comedy adventure full of humor, chaos, and meta mischief. WISHLIST NOW!
